definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
variant of 漁汛期|渔汛期[yu2 xun4 qi1]

sentences.english: The embankment must be reinforced before the flood season.
sentences.chinese: 坝基一定要在洪汛期到来之前加固好。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake helps keep down floods on the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 在汛期，都阳湖有助于制止长江泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: Flood season has uncertainty and belongs to fuzzy sets.
sentences.chinese: 提出汛期具有不确定性，属于模糊集合。

sentences.english: Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
sentences.chinese: 在洪汛期到来之前，大家早已做好了抗涝减灾准备。

sentences.english: It floods regularly, and we risk rubbish floating straight back to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 此河流有汛期，我们要冒着垃圾被冲回罗马市的威胁。

sentences.english: For Ms. Khatun and other villagers, life is difficult during the flood season.
sentences.chinese: 对可敦女士和其他村民来说，汛期生活艰难。

sentences.english: The flood season is approaching, so the dike in our village needs reinforcing.
sentences.chinese: 汛期快到了，村里的圩埂需要加固了。

sentences.english: As a dirt siltation of rivers in flood season will cause rainwater intrusion phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 由于河道有污物淤积，在汛期还会造成雨水倒灌现象。

sentences.english: During the flood season, the Poyang Lake helps keep down floods on the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 在汛期，都阳湖有助于制止长江泛滥成灾。

definition: period of low water level (winter in north China)
